ygData.subject: RE: Max damage?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They ve realigned the monster levels before.  Most of the orcs in Highpass were green to me at L19, and they suddenly became blue after a patch (which
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 12 Jul 1999, CMai wrote:
>
> Now I do not know about the song affecting the dmg but it
> seems that they must have increase the MOB hit factor
> because I noticed the same thing these past 4 days. I am
> lvl 23 now but I was lvl 22 the whole last week. I used
> to kill gorge hound with ease from lvl 20 to 22 but
> somehow now they are hitting me really hard at max dmg.
> I have full bronze since lvl 18. The only thing that was
> changed in my armor since the past 4 days is that I got a
> BS Mantle and a elf-hide glove. My str is 95, my dex is
> 107, and my agi is 108.

They've realigned the monster levels before. Most of the orcs
in Highpass were green to me at L19, and they suddenly became
blue after a patch (which wasn't too bad since it meant I
didn't have to find new hunting grounds for a couple more
levels).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
